articles.author: Ben Noll
articles.title: Here’s how close Hurricane Erin was to being another Sandy - The Washington Post
articles.description: Hurricane Erin’s 7,000 mile journey across the Atlantic will reach Europe this week. The storm’s impact could have been much worse.
articles.content:
Hurricane Erin is in rare company as far as Atlantic hurricanes go. When it comes to large hurricanes that tracked near the East Coast, only one storm compares: Hurricane Sandy in October 2012.
Othe… [+252 chars]
